Content.Text:
<FACE_PES><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
<NAME_UNKNOWN>What took ya', Flik? I been waitin' so long, I
almost fell asleep!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sorry, Pepita! I'll pick out a pretty flower for you
later, to make it up to you.

<FACE_PES><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wellll... 's good you're such a charmer. Guess I
can forgive ya'. <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, what did you discover in your investigation?

<FACE_PES><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Buncha stuff! Honeybees love this area.
Mushrooms an' flowers do real good here too.
<PAGE>
Oh, and tall crops. I'm thinkin' those would
thrive here for sure. An' that's my report!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You found some prime land for growing. Good
work!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Whoa, is that you, <MYNAME>? How'd you
manage to sneak up on us when you're so big?

<FACE_PES><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, this that human? Howdy-ho, <MYNAME>.
Name's <BLUE>Pepita</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
So ya' really CAN see us, huh? How wonderfully
bizarre!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, now that we know what kind of plants
grow best here, we should get a move on. Bye
now!

<FACE_PES><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wait up, Flik! You owe me a flower!

Those little Nature Sprites are pretty cute. I
wonder if I'll see them again...
